thread.section_title: Hotel De Nell - UPDATED 2017 Reviews & Price Comparison (Paris, France) - TripAdvisor
thread.title: Home Away from Home
thread.title_full: Home Away from Home - Review of Hotel De Nell, Paris, France - TripAdvisor

author: joelle919
title: Home Away from Home
text: The hotel has beautiful, modern, but still traditional decor. The location was great- plenty of restaurants and nearby to places of interest. The food was delicious- we had breakfast every morning in the restaurant downstairs. The staff was invaluable as they provided excellent recommendations, so hospitable and welcoming. We enjoyed our stay and intend to stay there in the future.
